basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.about: Dynamic and detail-oriented full-stack web developer with a passion for coding, learning and creating, with experience in Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, and React. I am a self-motivated fast learner, who can solve problems as an individual contributor or as a team member, and bring innovation and efficiency to companies.

projects.name: Share Table
projects.description: An event app that helps people find partners to eat out with
detail: Developed a Rails API with endpoints for users, restaurants, events, messages and notifications
Implemented user interface with React, Redux and utilized Ant Design as the UI library
Initialized restaurants’ information from different cities using Yelp API
Utilized JSON Web Tokens and localStorage to store encrypted user information client-side

projects.name: T&B Type Racer
projects.description: A game that tests a user’s typing speed
detail: Developed a SPA using React for front-end and Ruby on Rails for back-end with CSS for styling
Used paragraphs from two books for typing challenges to acquire data on users
Authenticated user’s account by JWT to protect API routes
Deployed both back-end and front-end using Heroku

projects.name: Cute-Cute
projects.description: A children’s game that allows users to create rooms and add stickers in each room
detail: Developed using Vanilla JavaScript for front-end, Rails as the back-end, styled using CSS
Deployed back-end using Heroku and front-end using GitHub page

work.name: Project Untaboo
details: Collaborate with 7 people in engineering team on technical decisions including mobile development framework, database and unit test package used for our project
Develop front end chat features, request/response flow using Javascript, React-Native, Redux, Formik, jest for mobile application
Design 15+ wireframes with UI team; participate in project’s flow with UI and Engineering team

work.name: Qosina Corporation
details: Verified the material in the company’s system matched those in the supplier documents, updated MSDS, MTDS and product stewardship documents which provides our customer the most up to date information
Evaluated material performance characteristics of the incoming components to reduce material error rates Managed the material change notification information
Provided the customer with the material data, REACH compliance, RoHS compliance and Mineral conflict information. Communicated with customers to solve the technical issues of the defective products

education.major: Full-time Full Stack Web Development Student
Master of Science, Materials Science & Engineering
education.thesis: Characterization of Defects in Single Crystal Epitaxial Silicon for Solar Cells
